ComicInfo.Summary:
Ryan Ferrier and Valentin Ramon are back with D4VEOCRACY, the third arc of the acclaimed D4VE series. In the wake of a robo-political assassination, D4VE begins a presidential campaign. A hip new app startup has other plans for the robot society, however, and creates the perfect political rival.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Valentin Ramon | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Valentin Ramon | 2 | Note: The digital edition (1/18/2017) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-25 23:55:47. [CVDB576896]
ComicInfo.Characters: 54LLY, 5COTTY, BR4D, D4VE, GL3NN, Roombo, S4M, Sleazy
